author: Hank Green
description:
Go to https://ground.news/hank for a better way to stay informed. Subscribe for 40% off unlimited access to world-wide coverage through my link.

I recorded this video months ago, I think it was about something a YouTuber tweeted but then I had to sit on it for ages so it didn't seem like I was talking about specific things some people were angry with me about. It felt like I made the video come true!! Even now I'm worried about putting it out because I don't think anyone is particularly good at teasing out bad faith critiques from the good, necessary critiques. It all gets lumped together into one big feeling. I definitely haven't finished teasing this all out, but having experienced both good and bad faith critique from both the mainstream press and various groups of individuals on the internet, I have only able really been able to make my way through it by understanding that, culturally, I am more than just a guy. 

People feel like they're throwing rocks at a big, powerful robot,
title: The Thing About Power that the Powerful Can't Understand
